fullDescription.text: Token is neither in the dictionary nor expected

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Correct spelling
- Add to [expect](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#expect)
- Mask using [patterns](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#patterns)

**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Alter text so the pattern does not match
- Add a [pattern](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#patterns) to patterns.txt that matches (a portion of) the flagged content to accept it
- Delete, edit, or comment out the pattern

fullDescription.text: Forbidden pattern matched this text
There were more non-words than dictionary words in the file

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add the file to [excludes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#excludes)
- Add more words to the dictionary
- Use patterns to mask tokens.

fullDescription.text: There were more non-words than dictionary words in the file list

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Disable [`check_file_names`](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#excludes)
- Add more words from file paths/names to the dictionary
- Use patterns to mask tokens.

**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add the file to [excludes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#excludes)
- Adjust 'largest_file' in action configuration if you want to check the file.

fullDescription.text: File is very large
There were an excessive number of uses of this token. Not all instances are identified.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add word to the [dictionary](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#allow)
- Correct the spelling
- To see more instances, increase action configuration "unknown_word_limit".

**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add the pattern to [patterns](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#patterns)
- Remove the pattern from candidates.patterns

fullDescription.text: A line with unrecognized tokens matches a pattern. Patterns enable the tool to ignore content.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Correct the [patterns](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#patterns)
- See [bad-regex](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Event-descriptions#bad-regex)
- Remove the pattern.

fullDescription.text: Perl did not like the regular expression pattern.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Correct the dictionary address.
- Check the [dictionary_source_prefixes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#dictionary_source_prefixes)
- Remove the entry.

fullDescription.text: The specified dictionary could not be found.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Correct the dictionary address.
- Check the [dictionary_source_prefixes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#dictionary_source_prefixes)
- Remove the entry.

fullDescription.text: The specified dictionary could not be found.
The specified dictionary could not be found.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Correct the dictionary address.
- Check the [dictionary_source_prefixes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#dictionary_source_prefixes)
- Remove the entry.

**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Correct the dictionary address.
- Check the [dictionary_source_prefixes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#dictionary_source_prefixes)
- Remove the entry.

fullDescription.text: The specified dictionary could not be found.
The specified file is missing a newline at the end of the file.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add a blank line to the end of the file.

**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Remove non-alpha characters
- Place each word on its own line

fullDescription.text: The dictionary entry has non-alpha characters.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

Note that this check is against the file path not the displayed line.
- Rename file/directory to correct spelling
- Add to [expect](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#expect)
- Mask using [patterns](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#patterns)

fullDescription.text: Token in file path is neither in the dictionary nor expected
File has incredibly long lines, perhaps it's minified?

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add the file to [excludes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#excludes)
- Add 'minified-file' to 'disable_checks' in the configuration.

fullDescription.text: Workflow 'extra_dictionaries' contains multiple entries for the same dictionary

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Remove duplicate entries. check-spelling will ignore duplicate instances.

**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add the file to [excludes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#excludes)

fullDescription.text: File contains a utf-16 surrogate. It's likely not a text file.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add the file to [excludes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#excludes)
- Disable `use_file_magic`

fullDescription.text: File magic determined to be binary. It's likely not a text file.
While trying to find the token in the line, the exact instance could not be found.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add the entry to [expect](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#expect)
- Correct any overeager [patterns](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#patterns)
- See [Feature: Warning about substring matches](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Feature%3A-Warning-about-substring-matches)

**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add the entry to [excludes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#excludes)
- Adjust [patterns](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#patterns)
- Adjust the [timeout](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Feature%3A-Parsing-Timeouts#configuration)
- See [Feature: Parsing Timeouts](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Feature%3A-Parsing-Timeouts)

fullDescription.text: Parsing the file exceeded the parsing timeout.
Multiple related word variants listed in expect

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Remove the entry from [expect](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#expect)

fullDescription.text: After applying any excludes and only patterns, no files were found to check.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Remove or fix patterns in [excludes](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#excludes)
- Remove or broaden patterns in [only](https://docs.check-spelling.dev/Configuration#only)

fullDescription.text: Action is configured with `suppress_push_for_open_pull_request` but there is no configured on: pull_request event handler.

help.markdown:
**Remediation (click "Show more" below)**:

- Add `pull_request` / `pull_request_target` to the `on:` section of the workflow
- Remove `suppress_push_for_open_pull_request:` from the configuration.
- If you have the event handler configured and you see this, please file a bug (including your workflow file).
